english.segment1: Shut down, fall asleep. the more you hold the less you keep. untied your concern. the stronger the grip the more you'll burn

english.segment3: don't speak, breathe in deep. he's so sycophantic I can't understand it. hold fast, this won't last. his long-suffering is what takes timing. find your great divide. you might hesitate but I don't recommend it
